deleteTaskTitle: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
deleteTaskMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone. Any RPI data for this task will also be removed.
confirmDeleteTasks: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} tasks?
deleteTasksWarning: Deleted tasks cannot be recovered. Any RPI data for the deleted tasks will also be removed. If you delete all tasks in a workspace, its .roo/rpi folder will be removed too.
deleteWithSubtasks: This will also delete {{count}} subtask(s). Are you sure? Any RPI data for these tasks will also be removed.
